message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $250 is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $80.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $180.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $180 is still a bit too high for me. How about we split the difference and I pay you $130?  This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go as low as $130, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $190.
